name: Water
description: Water can be cosidered soft, but combined with lighting or freezing it is more deadly and powerful than others

1.name: Find water
1.description: Those of water always know where to find it

2.name: Bucket / Water shield
2.description: Bucket of water only for you which can be shaped to shield you

3.name: Water missile
3.description: You can throw your bucket of water at anyone in sight

5.name: Water elemental
5.description: Living water at your service, if you are worth, can flood whole villages, bring violent rains or tides. Allows you to change where water will flow.
